CustomField.description: Field used for VVS (Vista Value Selling) Closing Plan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Have I successfully identified and engaged everyone who gets a vote—either “yes” or “no” (i.e., Procurement, Finance, IT, Legal)?
CustomField.label: Power Map: Decision Maker Engagement

value.fullName: 1 - I've just started capturing this information
